title: Death Toll Rises in Iran's Kurdish Areas
description: Iran’s military crackdown on protesters in the country’s Kurdish region is becoming increasingly deadly.

title: China Is Investing Billions in Pakistan. Its Workers There Are Under Attack.
description: Beijing’s Belt and Road investment strategy meets resistance in the developing world it seeks to influence.

title: Conservatism Grows in Brazil, Despite Leftist President
description: Conservative politicans backed by a wealthy agricultural sector cement their presence in Congress, churches and commerce despite right-wing President Bolsonaro’s election loss

title: Remote Town Is Home to 900 Humans and 850 Polar Bears
description: In autumn, a Canadian town becomes a place where residents ‘check around corners’

title: Pope Francis Compares Russia's War Against Ukraine to Genocide
description: The pontiff issued his strongest condemnation to date of Russia’s war against Ukraine, linking it to Joseph Stalin’s 1930s terror famine, which the pope described as genocide.

title: Indonesia Earthquake Leaves Tens Of Thousands Displaced
description: Rescue teams continued their search for the dozens of people who remain missing since a 5.6-magnitude earthquake struck Indonesia on Monday killing at least 271 people.

title: Much of China Locks Down With No End to Zero Covid in Sight
description: Beijing shopping and office districts were nearly deserted as millions of people across the country remained under lockdown, and the number of cases across the mainland appeared set to surpass the previous peak of almost 29,000.

title: Russia Strikes Maternity Ward in Southern Ukraine
description: The attacks on a hospital in the Zaporizhzhia region killed at least three, including an infant, with more people likely under the rubble, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said.

title: The World's Biggest Airports Confront a Tiny But Serious Safety Threat---Wasps
description: Every week, workers at one of Australia’s major airports spend hours searching the tarmac and terminals for a security threat that could bring down an airplane.

title: Two Explosions in Jerusalem Kill One, Injure 18
description: Both explosions occurred near bus stops in what the police suspect was an organized terrorist attack; no group has yet taken responsibility.
